Title: The Great Agon Schedule
Text:
The start date of each Great Agon varies. Please refer to announcements from the Ephor's Palace for official scheduling.

Preliminaries
The preliminaries follow a points-based system, with events including but not limited to: Echo Duels, Echo Speed Tests, and Echo Teamwork Challenges. These matches test a team's overall mastery of Echoes. At the end of the preliminaries, the top 20 teams by cumulative score will advance to the Finals.

Finals
The Finals follow a single-elimination format. The top 20 teams from the preliminaries, along with specially selected teams, will face off in one-on-one matches. Winners advance until the final match determines the Champion team.

Special Qualifiers
Also held in single-elimination format, the Special Qualifiers pit participants against each other in matches involving Echo vs. Echo or Echo vs. Gladiator combat. Victors inherit the defeated side's accumulated points. Once a participant reaches the required point threshold, they earn a direct entry into the Finals.
